Verses: 1 en Suvaasam Ozhigiradhu, En Naatkal Mudigiradhu; Predhakkuzhi Enakku Aayaththamaayirukkiradhu.
2 pariyaasampannugiravargal Ennidaththil Illaiyo? Avargal Seyyum Aniyaayangalai En Kan Paarththukkondirukkiradhu.
3 dhevareer En Kaariyaththai Melpottukkondu, Enakkaagap Pinaippaduveeraaga; Vere Yaar Enakkuk Kaikodukkaththakkavar?
4 neer Avargal Irudhayaththukku Gnaanaththai Maraiththeer; Aagaiyaal Avargalai Uyarththaadhiruppeer.
5 evan Than Snegidharukkuk Kedaaga Dhrogam Pesugiraano, Avan Pillaigalin Kangalum Pooththuppogum.
6 janangalukkulle Avar Ennaip Pazhamozhiyaaga Vaiththaar; Avargal Mugaththukkumun Naan Aruvaruppaanen.
7 idhinimiththam En Kangal Sanjalaththinaal Iruladaindhadhu; En Avayavangalellaam Nizhalaippolirukkiradhu.
8 sanmaarkkar Idharkaagap Bramippaargal; Kutramillaadhavan Maayakkaaranukku Virodhamaaga Ezhumbuvaan.
9 needhimaan Than Vazhiyai Urudhiyaaip Pidippaan; Suththamaana Kaigalullavan Menmelum Balaththuppovaan.
10 ippodhum Neengal Ellaarum Poivaarungal; Ungalil Gnaanamulla Oruvanaiyum Kaanen.
11 en Naatkal Poyitru; En Irudhayaththil Enakku Undaayirundha Sindhanaigal Atruppoyitru.
12 avaigal Iravaip Pagalaakkitru; Irulai Velichcham Thodarndhuvarum Endru Ennachcheydhadhu.
13 appadi Naan Kaaththukkondirundhaalum, Paadhaalam Enakku Veedaayirukkum; Irulil En Padukkaiyaip Poduven.
14 azhivaippaarththu, Nee Enakkuth Thagappan Engiren; Puzhukkalaippaarththu, Neengal Enakkuth Thaayum Enakku Sagodhariyum Engiren.
15 en Nambikkai Ippodhu Enge? Naan Nambiyirundhadhaik Kaanbavan Yaar?
16 adhu Paadhaalaththin Kaavalukkul Irangum; Appodhu Thoolil Egamaai Ilaippaaruvom Endraan.
